Cr\u00e9neau: Sem 1 MS/Sem 3 MSem 2 MS/Sem 4 MSem 4 M
Objectifs du module: The course introduces the main tools used by corporations to run the appraisal and control process of their industrial investment projects. It focuses on cash flows from investment decisions, risk and uncertainty, and their impact on value creation on a global scale. The course is applied to a wide variety of industrial companies and also to companies from sectors such as social networks, bio-foods and medical care with real cases and examples.
Contr\u00f4le des connaissances - R\u00e: The evaluation process consists in : a final exam for 70% of the grade and a personal case study work for the remaining 30%
D\u00e9partement de rattachement: Master of Science Sustainable Impact Analysis
